fields.label: Warranty Plan ID
fields.description: Auto-generated sequential ID for mobile/API integration

fields.label: Company
fields.description: Company this warranty plan applies to.

fields.label: Plan Name
fields.description: e.g. 'Extended Warranty - 1 Year', 'Screen Protection Plan'

fields.label: Plan Type
fields.options:
Own Warranty
Extended Warranty
Value Added Service
Protection Plan
fields.description: Own Warranty = manufacturer/store warranty. Extended = paid extension. VAS = screen protector, data transfer, etc.

fields.label: Service Item
fields.description: The ERPNext Item (is_stock_item=0) that represents this plan in transactions. Created as a non-stock service item.

fields.label: Brand
fields.description: Restrict this plan to a specific brand. Leave blank = all brands.

fields.label: Validity Period
fields.description: Leave blank for evergreen plans. Set dates for promotional / campaign-bound plans.

fields.label: Valid From
fields.description: Plan is available for sale starting this date. Blank = always available.

fields.label: Valid To
fields.description: Plan stops being available for sale after this date. Blank = no end date.

fields.label: Duration (Months)
fields.description: Duration of the warranty/plan in months. 0 = one-time service.

fields.label: Coverage Description
fields.description: What is covered under this plan

fields.label: Max Claims
fields.description: Maximum number of claims allowed under this plan. 0 = unlimited.

fields.label: Deductible Amount
fields.description: Amount customer must pay per claim (excess).

fields.label: Standard Price
fields.description: Base selling price of this plan

fields.label: Pricing Mode
fields.description: Fixed = flat rate. Percentage = calculated as % of the device selling price.

fields.label: Percentage Value
fields.description: Percentage of device price when pricing_mode = Percentage

fields.label: Cost to Company
fields.description: What this plan costs GoFix (underwriting, third-party premium, etc.)

fields.label: Applicable Item Groups
fields.description: Item Groups this plan can be attached to. Leave blank = all.

fields.label: Attach Level
fields.description: Item = auto-added per qualifying item line. Bill = one per transaction. Optional = offered to customer.

fields.label: Applicable Channels
fields.description: Channels where this plan is available. Leave blank = all channels.
